name: School Boss
description:
Lafayette school is a prestigious private school.

Despite its fame, the school have a lot of issues!

Insecurity, lack of infrastructures, inequalities, division...

You decided to be candidate for the upcoming student council election and put an end to the deterioration of the school!

Will you be the next school boss?

This game is a submission for the RPG MAKER MZ Game Jame of Studio Blue:

"You got it, Now use it!"
